messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] speaking of words...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/2004 7:31:56 PM Mountain Daylight Time, muddpies@msn.com writes: Sandra, a while back you made a comment about how the word young uns
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/2004 7:31:56 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
muddpies@... writes:
Sandra,

a while back you made a comment about how the word "young'uns" among
others intrinsically implies disrespect and i was wondering if you
could expound on that a bit? i've never had or known of anyone having
a problem with it so i'm curious. maybe a regional thing?

cris
==========

Maybe I have prejudices because the people who used certain terms happened
also to be social groups in which respect for children was non-existent.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
